column4: Where can I download the universe packages from .. if I'm not using Ubuntu ?
you can open the same URL's with a web browser that you can open with apt in sources.list.
just use the same URL's that are in sources.list
will you give me one as I'm not using ubuntu right now
That's what "apt-cache show" says about libmad
I'm taking off.  This channel has people in here asking stupid questions, then bitching about others asking stupid questions.  Not my scene.
